page.title: 12Home Life 2 (continued)
page.content: I vary my return route so that I cover about 10 miles in all.I try to get out every day to keep myself fit. My next task is to filter some wheat wine I am making.Now it goes into storage for a time before being bottled.Then comes half an hour or so at the piano and it is tea time.Here we take the Scots high tea instead of later dinner. In the evening I drive to Bridge of Earn to the Community Council meeting.I am the secretary and take the minutes of the proceedings.Here we discuss and try to sort out any local problems-schools,roads,vandalism,in fact anything which concerns our local life from day to day. Back home about 10p.m. I might watch some T.V., or, more likely, read one of my library books.
